195b3('bum): yongs su dag pa'o// skye ba la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni skye ba yongs su dag
195b4('bum): pa'o// rga shi la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rga shi yongs su dag pa'o// rab
195b5('bum): 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
195b6('bum): byin pa yongs su dag pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba
195b7('bum): med pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa/
196a1('bum): pa dang / rnam par blang ba med pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skye ba med pa dang /
196a2('bum): 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha
196a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
196a4('bum): dag pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol
196a5('bum): tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni
196a6('bum): nang stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni byi stong
196a7('bum): pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni phyi nang
196b1('bum): stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni phyi na
196b2('bum): stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni
196b3('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba
196b4('bum): med pa ni chen po stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam
196b5('bum): par byang ba med pa ni don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa
196b6('bum): dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas
196b7('bum): nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang
197a1('bum): 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs
197a2('bum): su dag pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa
197a3('bum): ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med
197a4('bum): ba dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas
197a5('bum): nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa
197a6('bum): med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la skye ba med
197a7('bum): pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o// mi dmigs pa stong
197b1('bum): pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o//
197b2('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongasu
197b3('bum): dag pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag med pa dang / kun nas nyin mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
197b4('bum): yongs su dag pa'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par
197b5('bum): byang ba med pa ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang
197b6('bum): 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni dran pa zhe gzhag pa yongs su dag pa'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams
197b7('bum): la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni yang dag par spong ba yongs su dag pa'o//
198a1('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med
198a2('bum): ba ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa yongs su dag pa'o// dbang po rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med
198a3('bum): ba ni dbang po yongs su dag pa'o// stobs rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa
198a4('bum): ni stobs yongs su dag pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa
198a5('bum): ni byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su dag pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /
198a6('bum): rnam par byang ba med pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad bden pa rnams la skye ba med pa
198a7('bum): dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni 'phags pa'i bden pa yongs su dag pa'o// bsam gtan rnams
198b1('bum): la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni bsam gtan yongs su dag pa'o// tshad med pa rnams
198b2('bum): la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni tshad med pa yongs su dag pa'o// gzugs med pa'i
198b3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni gzugs med pa'i
198b4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su dag pa'o// rnam par thar pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par
198b5('bum): byang ba med pa ni rnam par thar pa yongs su dag pa'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas
198b6('bum): nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su dag pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
198b7('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam par thar pa'i
199a1('bum): sgo stong nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa yongs su dag pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang /
199a2('bum): 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni mngon par shes pa yongs su dag pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams la skye ba
199a3('bum): med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams
199a4('bum): la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni gzungs kyi sgo yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin
199a5('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
199a6('bum): stobs yongs su dag pa'o// mi 'jigs pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni mi
199a7('bum): 'jigs pa yongs su dag pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam
199b1('bum): par byang ba med pa ni so so yang dag par rig pa yongs su dag pa'o// snying rje chen po la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs med pa
199b2('bum): dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni snying rje chen po yongs su dag pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun
199b3('bum): nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
199b4('bum): la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su dag pa'o//
199b5('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni lan cig phyir 'ong
199b6('bum): ba'i 'bras bu yongs su dag pa'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang
199b7('bum): ba med pa ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yong su dag pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa da // kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam
200a1('bum): pa byang ba pas da pa // dbyung chub la ste ba med pa dang / bgag pa med pa dang / dam tshan ma
200a2('bum): zad pa dang / rnam par byeng ba med pan rang byang chub yongs su dag pa'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes bzhid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gasapa med pa dang / kun nam
200a3('bum): mangs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni las kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag
200a4('bum): med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor nam mkha' yongs
200a5('bum): sradag shes sa na pa sangs su dag ga/ gsas pa/ mas na 'das sgyu la bangs su dog /
200a6('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rang
200a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor nam mkha' la 'gro ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// gsol pa/
200b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' la 'go ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
200b2('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' gzung su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor nam mkha' la tha snyad med pa'i
200b3('bum): phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' le tha snyad ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol
200b4('bum): tu phyin pa yongs su dag lag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i sgra brnyan gnyis kyi sgra ltar nam mkha' tha snyad
200b5('bum): med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor nam mkha' brjod du med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
200b6('bum): dag pa'o// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' brjod du ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom
200b7('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' la ni gang yang brjod du med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du nam mkha' brjod du med pa'i phyir shes rab
201a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang nam mkha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
201a2('bum): byin pa yongs su dag pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu
201a3('bum): dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor na mkha' la gang yang dmigs su med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du nam mkha' dmigs
201a4('bum): su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang //
201a5('bum): kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs bu dag pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/
201a6('bum): chos thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab
201a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ shes ra gyi rog sa la phags
201b1('bum): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di/ 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog
201b2('bum): ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das de la mig gi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ rna ba'i nad dang / sna'i nang dang / lce'i nad dang / yan lag ma chad
201b3('bum): bar mi 'gyur ro// lus ngan par mi 'gyur ro// rgas par 'khogs pa'i lus su mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni mi bde ba mi spongs pas dus
201b4('bum): byed par mi 'gyur ro// de'i slad bzhin lha brgya stong mang po 'brang bar 'gyur te/ rgyal chen rigs bzhi'i lha dang / sum bcu rtsa sum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang /
201b5('bum): 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang /
201b6('bum): tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung me dang / tshang med che ba dang / 'bras
201b7('bum): bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nos snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang slad bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur ro// gang na chos
202a1('bum): smra ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa der yang ches brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la
202a2('bum): lha'i tshogs chen po 'du bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa'i tshe/ bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur te/
202a3('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu mang ba/ tshad ma mchis pa grangs ma mchis pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa ma mchis pa/ gzhal du
202a4('bum): ma mchis pa dpag tu ma mchis pa rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am
202a5('bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa 'di lha'i 'khor gyi mdun du ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs bu mo
202a6('bum): de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel te/ bsod nams kyi phung po mang pa tshad med pa grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa med pa gzhal tu med pa/ dpag tu med
202a7('bum): pa rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che'o// rab 'byor de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
202b1('bum): pa rin po che 'di lta ste/ sems can dmyal ba las yongs su grol bar byed do// byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jigs rten dang / lha dang mi dbul po las
202b2('bum): yongs su grol bar byed do// rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o// bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o// khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i ribs 'byin
202b3('bum): pa'o// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// mtshe ma'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o//
202b4('bum): dga' ldan gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// 'phrul dga'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched na byin pa'o//
202b5('bum): tshangs ris kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched
202b6('bum): 'byin pa'o// tshangs chen gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// snang ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// chung snang gi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin
202b7('bum): pa'o// chad med snang ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// kun sdang dang ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// dge ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched
203a1('bum): 'byin pa'o// chung dge'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// tshad med dge ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// dge rgyas kyi lha'i
203a2('bum): skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// che ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// chung che'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// tshad med che ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin
203a3('bum): pa'o// 'bras bu che ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// mi che ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// mi gdung ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// shiH
203a4('bum): tu mthong ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// gya nom snang ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// 'og min gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// nam mkha'
203a5('bum): mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha/
203a6('bum): skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o//
203a7('bum): lan cig phyin 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid 'byin pa'o// rang byang chub 'byin pa'o// yang dag pa
203b1('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'byin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rgyas par bstan te/ de la
203b2('bum): bslabs pas rgyal ris che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//
203b3('bum): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mche'i mi'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi rnams yod do// 'bru
203b4('bum): dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs
203b5('bum): pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med
203b6('bum): snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// chang med dge ba'i
203b7('bum): lha rnams yong ngo // dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams phod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu
204a1('bum): che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi garung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams
204a2('bum): yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha'
204a3('bum): yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//
204a4('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang
204a5('bum): chub yod do// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yod na bsam gtan bzhi yod do// tshad med pa
204a6('bum): bzhi yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yod do// yang dag par spong ba bzhi yod do// rdzu
204a7('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yod do// dbang po lnga yod do// stobs lnga yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag bcad
204b1('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//
204b2('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do//
204b3('bum): phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod ngo do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus
204b4('bum): byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do//
204b5('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do//
204b6('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod
204b7('bum): do// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yod do// bsam gtan bzhi yod do// tshad med pa bzhi yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi
205a1('bum): yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par
205a2('bum): thar pa'i sgo gsum yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin thams cad yod do// gzungs kyi sgo thams cad yod do// de bzhin
205a3('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yod do// mi 'jigs pa bzhi yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yod do// byams pa chen po yod do// snying rje
205a4('bum): chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do// thams cad shes pa nyid yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do//
205a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// de yang 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ 'di la bslabs
205a6('bum): na rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//
205a7('bum): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams phod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams lon
205b1('bum): tshangs nazhe lan gyi lha rnams yod //
205b2('bum): do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor
205b3('bum): gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod de// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams
205b4('bum): yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dga'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod
205b5('bum): do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu
205b6('bum): che ba'i rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i
205b7('bum): lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched
205b8('bum): kye lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes meng 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rgyun
206a1('bum): tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams
206a2('bum): yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
206a3('bum): rgyas rnams yod do// de bas na de la pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che zhes bya'o// pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che de la ni chos gang yang skye ba 'am 'gag pa 'am/
206a4('bum): kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am/ yongs su gzung ba 'am dor ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang skye ba 'am/
206a5('bum): 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am/ yongs su gzung ba 'am/ dor bar bya ba'i chos de lta bu med do// rab 'byor
206a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba 'am/ 'jig rten pa 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/ zag
206a7('bum): ba med pa 'am/ 'das byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang dmig su med do// rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che ni dmig
206b1('bum): su med do// rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che la ni chos gang gis kyang 'go ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang 'go bar 'gyur ba'i chos de
206b2('bum): lta bu dmigs su med do// rab 'byor de'i phyir na pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'go ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sem
206b3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar 'du shes par yang mi byed la de ltar mi rtog cing de ltar mi dmigs te/ de ltar 'phro bar yang mi byed
206b4('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o// de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed do//
206b5('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon par bsams shing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phud dud
206b6('bum): du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing
206b7('bum): yongs su sbyong bar byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang ston pa 'am/
207a1('bum): rnam par ston pa 'am/ yongs su ston pa 'am/ 'dzin par byed pa 'am/ 'byin par byed pa 'am/ skye bar byed pa 'am/ 'gog par byed
207a2('bum): ba 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa 'am/ rnam par byang bar byed pa 'am/ 'grib par byed pa 'am/ 'phel bar byed pa'am/ 'das pa 'am/ ma 'ongs pa 'am/
207a3('bum): da ltar byung bar byed pa med do// rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod pa'i khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas pa myu yin/ gzugs
207a4('bum): kyi khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed pa ma yin no// /
207a5('bum): ma po bcu pa'o// /
207a6('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma
207a7('bum): yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
207b1('bum): pa sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin 'dor
207b2('bum): ba ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba
207b3('bum): ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
207b4('bum): sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ theg ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin 'dor pa ma yin//
207b5('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin 'dor pa ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma
207b6('bum): yin 'dor ba ma yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ ngo bo nyid
207b7('bum): stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
208a1('bum): rnams sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rgung pa rnams
208a2('bum): sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ dbang po rnams sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ stobs rnams sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
208a3('bum): sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan brgyad pa sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin 'dor pa
208a4('bum): ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ tshad med pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
208a5('bum): pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
208a6('bum): sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ mngon par shes
208a7('bum): ba rnams sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/
208b1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ so so yang dag par
208b2('bum): rig pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ byams pa chen po sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ snying rje chen po sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/
208b3('bum): sangs rgyas chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ lan cig phyir 'o
208b4('bum): ba'i 'bras bu sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ dgra bcom pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin 'dor
208b5('bum): ma yin/ rang byang chub sgrub pa yin 'dor ba ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nying
208b6('bum): sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas kyi khams 'dor ba ma yin/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams sgrub pa ma
208b7('bum): yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sa byung yang rung / chos rnams kyi chos nying
209a1('bum): dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos kyi skyon med pa de ni de bzhin du gnas pa yin te/ de ni de bzhin
209a2('bum): gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par thugs su chud ngo // mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ mngon par rdzogs par zhugs
209a3('bum): su chud nas kyang gsung ngo // ston to// brjod do 'grel to// rnam par 'byed do// gsal bar mdzad do// yang dag par ston to// de nas lnga'i bu stong phrag
209a4('bum): mang po steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas lha'i lhung lhung ldeg gi sgra phyung ste/ lha rdzas kyi me tog ud pa la dang / pad mo dang ku mu ta dang phun da ri ka dang man da ra
209a5('bum): ba dang / man da ra ba chen pos mngon par 'thor zhing / 'di skad kyi tshig brjod par gyur to// kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pas/ lha'i
209a6('bum): stong phrag du ma skye ba med pa'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur te/ 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis su bskor bar mthong ngo // de nas bcom lda
209a7('bum): 'das kyis gnas brtan rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis su bskor
209b1('bum): ba yang ma yin/ gcig tu bskor ba yang ma yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang chos gang yang 'khor ba 'am mi 'khor bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas
209b2('bum): pa ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chos gang yang 'khor bar bgyi ba'i slad du nye bar mi gnas pa'i
209b3('bum): dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab
209b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtson
209b5('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul
209b6('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
209b7('bum): byi stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // byi nang stong pa nyid phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong
210a1('bum): chen po nyid chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // don dam pa stong pa nyid don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // 'dus byas
210a2('bum): stong pa nyid 'das byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
210a3('bum): mtha' las 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // dor ba med pa stong
210a4('bum): pa nyid dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // rang bzhin stong pa nyid rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // chos thams cad stong pa nyid chos thams cad
210a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa stong pa
210a6('bum): nyid kyis stong ngo // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // dngos
210a7('bum): bo med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // dran pa nye gzhag pa rnams dran pa zhi bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong
210b1('bum): ngo yang dag par spong ba rnams yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong ngo // rdzu 'phrul gyis rkang pa rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong ngo // dbang po
210b2('bum): rnams dbang po rnams kyis stong ngo // stobs rnams stobs rnams kyis stong ngo // byang chub kyi yan lag rnams byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong ngo //
210b3('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong ngo // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis
210b4('bum): stong ngo // bsam gtan rnams bsam gtan rnams kyis stong ngo // tshad med pa rnams tshad med pa rnams kyis stong ngo // gzugs med pa'i snyoms
210b5('bum): par 'jug pa rnams gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ngo // rnam par thar pa rnams rnam par thar pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
210b6('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ngo // rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
210b7('bum): dpa ma tshan ma mang ba dang smon pa med pa rnam par bar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pas stong ngo // mngon par shes pa rnams mngon
211a1('bum): par shes pa rnams kyis stong ngo // ting nge 'dzin rnams ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong ngo // gzungs kyi sgo rnams
211a2('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong ngo // mi 'jigs pa rnam
211a3('bum): mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong ngo // so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong ngo // byams pa chen po byams pa chen pos
211a4('bum): stong ngo // snying rje chen po snying rje chen pos stong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo // rgyun
211a5('bum): tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong ngo // lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ngo // phyir mi 'ong
211a6('bum): ba'i 'bras bu phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ngo // dgra bcom pa nyid dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong ngo // rang byang chub rang byang chub kyis stong ngo // lam gyi
211a7('bum): rnam pa nyid lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ngo // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo // gsol pa/ bcom
211b1('bum): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chen mo ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang
211b2('bum): bzhin stong pa'o// de ni chos thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyis stong la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
211b3('bum): phyin pa la gnas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya'o// chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
211b4('bum): rgya ba ma mchis/ chos kyi 'khor lo yang bskor la/ chos gang yang 'khor ba 'am mi 'khor ba 'am/ rab tu 'khor bar bgyid pa ma mchis te/ de dag gis
211b5('bum): chos gang yang yongs su mthong ba 'am/ yongs su ma mthong ba gang yang ma mchis so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang 'khor bar bgyid pa 'am//
211b6('bum): mi 'khor bar mi bgyid pa 'am/ rabu 'khor bar bgyid pa'i chos de lta bu dmigs su ma mchis te/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad kyang shin tu mngon par
211b7('bum): ma grub pa'o// stong pa nyid ni 'khor bar bgyid pa 'am mi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags so// mtshan ma mchis pa ni 'khor bar bgyid pa 'am mi
211b8('bum): ci sradu zhe na/
212a1('bum): 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags so// smon pa ma mchis pa ni 'khor bar bgyid pa'am mi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags so//
212a2('bum): de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa dang / rab tu bstan pa dang / bsgrags pa dang / rab tu 'god pa dang / gzhag pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / rnam
212a3('bum): par grol ba dang / smon pa dang gsal bar bgyi ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
212a4('bum): ba bstan pa de yang sus kyang ma bstan/ sus kyang ma bzung ngo // gang sus kyang ma bstan/ sus kyang ma bzung ba de ni sus kyang mngon tu ma bgyis pa'o// gang sus
212a5('bum): kyang mngon tu ma bgyis pa de la ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ma mchis te/ chos bstan pa 'di gang yang sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur ba ma mchis so// /
212a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u nyi shu dgu pa'o//
212a7('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kya nga rab tu phyin pa
212b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nam mkha' med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
212b2('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa
212b3('bum): nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par dben pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
212b4('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni thub pa ma
212b5('bum): mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
212b6('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ming dang lus med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/
212b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nam mkha'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba
213a1('bum): #ma/ na 'a/ sa rgyan pa na nga ma ma
213a2('bum): ral tu phyin 'a'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par dog pa dang / rnam par 'byod pa dmigs su med pa'i byor ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'ad
213a3('bum): 'di b+ha ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ming ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
213a4('bum): dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mchi ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol
213a5('bum): tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
213a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi 'phrogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad gzung du med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/
213a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni skad cig ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
213b1('bum): chos thams cad byang zhing zad pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni skye ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// ba
213b2('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
213b3('bum): pa 'di ni byed pa po ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byed pa po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan
213b4('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shes pa po ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes pa po dmig
213b5('bum): su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol ba bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'pho ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
213b6('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa// 'chi ba dang skye ba med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'jig pa ma mchis pa'i
213b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
214a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rmi lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rmi lam mthong ba
214a2('bum): dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di sgra brnyan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
214a3('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan pa dang sgra brjod par dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi sa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mig
214a4('bum): yor gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ me long gi bzhin dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes
214a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni smig rgyu'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chu 'bab pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/
214a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sgyu ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtshan ma dmigs su
214a7('bum): med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rmongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
214b1('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma rig pa'i mun pa dmig su med pa'i byir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni kun nas nyon
214b2('bum): mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom
214b3('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon
214b4('bum): mongs pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dmig su ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom
214b5('bum): na 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ gnas pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
214b6('bum): spros pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ spro ba thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/
214b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rlom sems ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
215a1('bum): rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro// gsol ba bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
215a2('bum): byin pa 'di ni mi g.yo ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan
215a3('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i pha rol phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams
215a4('bum): cad ma nor ba yang dag pa nyid du mngon par 'tshang rgya bar byed ba'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni kun nas
215a5('bum): ldang ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan
215a6('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zhi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med
215a7('bum): cing dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
215b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dod chags dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lnga ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
215b2('bum): 'di ni zhe sdang ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhe sdang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan
215b3('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gti mug ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi shes pa
215b4('bum): mun pa thams cad sel ba'i phyir ro// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu
215b5('bum): phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yongs su rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu/
215b6('bum): byin pa 'di ni sems can ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom
215b7('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rab tu spangs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad
216a1('bum): bza' rnam par spangs pa'i

216a3('bum): su mi 'gyur ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pa rol tu phyin pa 'din pa sa
216a4('bum): dad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'dres pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
216a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyam pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'da' bar byed par
216a6('bum): phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
216a7('bum): bral ba/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chad ma mchis
216a8('bum): pa'i sa rol du phyin pa'o/ mchis ldan 'das kyis pag rgya lob/ tshus thams cad kyi ma da nga migasu med pa phyir ro// gsol bcom ldan 'as dos te/
216b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nam mkha'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad la chags pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol
216b2('bum): pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi rtag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'jig
216b3('bum): pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/
216b4('bum): ba/ chos thams cad tshol bar sbyor ba med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bdag ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu
